title: UFO Whistleblower Claims He Saw Six 'Humanoids' at NASA's Goddard and Massive Craft Hidden in Korea
description: A former whistleblower claims to have seen alien bodies at NASA's Goddard Space Centre and a massive extraterrestrial craft hidden in Korea, sparking renewed UFO speculation.

title: Obama Lights Up UFO Chatter With 'Aliens Are Real' Remark, But Prediction Market Traders Remain Skeptical About Any Official Confirmation
description: A seemingly offhand comment from former U.S. President Barack Obama that "aliens are real" briefly lit up social media and market chatter, but prediction markets aren't pricing in an imminent disclosure of extraterrestrial life — at least not yet.Obama’s Statement Sparks FrenzyObama's remark came during a rapid-fire podcast interview with Brian Tyler Cohen published on Saturday, where he said the existence of alien life is likely given the vastness of the universe, but stressed he saw no evidence of contact during his presidency and dismissed conspiracy theories about facilities like Area 51. “They’re real but I haven’t seen them,” Obama said. The comment quickly circulated online and was picked up by major outlets, prompting a clarification from the former president on ...Full story available on Benzinga.com

title: The Society for UAP Studies Launches 'UAP Studies Seminar Series: Foundations of a New Field'
description: New public education initiative brings rigorous academic research on Unidentified Aerospace (or Anomalous) Phenomena (UAP) to a global audience.

title: Trump UFO announcement rumors persist online: What we know
description: Mark Christopher Lee, filmmaker and ufologist, shared information he said was from a “source inside the Trump administration.”

title: “They’re real”: Obama says aliens exist and UFO truthers lose their minds
description: "2026 is absolutely unhinged."Sign up to receive the Daily Dot’s Internet Insider newsletter for urgent news from the frontline of online.The post “They’re real”: Obama says aliens exist and UFO truthers lose their minds appeared first on The Daily Dot.
